product_name: DAKINE Pace Bike Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Great for riding over off-road trails or winding city streets, the DAKINE Pace bike shorts offer bold style and soft, lightweight coverage that delivers lasting comfort on and off the bike. Stretchy polyester fabric plus gusseted crotch allows complete freedom of motion. Front and back pockets provide handy storage; rip-and-stick side waist adjustments ensure a snug, stay-put fit. DAKINE Pace bike shorts are unlined. Closeout.
short_description: Great for riding over off-road trails or winding city streets, the DAKINE Pace bike shorts offer bold style and soft, lightweight coverage that delivers lasting comfort on and off the bike.
